product_name: Hugger Mugger Earth Elements Yoga Mat
long_description: The cushy Hugger Mugger Earth Elements yoga mat respects the planet and your yoga practice. Made with nontoxic thermal plastic elastomer (TPE) foam, the mat contains no latex, PVC or rubber; mat is biodegradable. Patterned surface provides traction. Closed-cell construction won't absorb fluids so it's easy to clean.
short_description: The cushy Hugger Mugger Earth Elements yoga mat respects the planet and your yoga practice.
